CN: 弃掉所有手牌，抽取弃掉数量 +2 的牌。
EN: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards plus 2.

CN: 对所有敌人造成 1 回合<WeaknessIconKeywords:虚弱>和<VulnerabilityIconKeywords:易伤>，<TouquKeywords:偷取>所有敌人 [Arg1] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。
EN: Inflict 1 turn of <WeaknessIconKeywords:Weakness> and <VulnerabilityIconKeywords:Vulnerable> on each enemy, and <TouquKeywords:Steal> [Arg1] <PowerIconKeywords:STR> from them.

CN: 获得 <Block:[Block:Arg1]> 点护盾，当前生命若低于 25%，回复 <Heal:[Heal:Arg2]> 点生命。
EN: Gain <Block:[Block:Arg1]> Shield. If current HP is below 25%, recover <Heal:[Heal:Arg2]> HP.

CN: 获得 <Block:[Block:Arg1]> 点护盾，当前生命若低于 25%([Arg3])，回复 <Heal:[Heal:Arg2]> 点生命。
EN: Gain <Block:[Block:Arg1]> Shield. If current HP is below <Heal:[Arg3]> (25%), recover <Heal:[Heal:Arg2]> HP.

CN: 获得 3 点算力。
EN: Recover 3 Arithmetica.

CN: 选择 1 名唤醒体使其获得 <Energy:[Arg1]> 点狂气。
EN: Increase a chosen Awakener's Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg1]>.

CN: 获得 [Arg1] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，额外获得等同于永久力量 25%的临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。
EN: Gain [Arg1] <PowerIconKeywords:STR>, then gain Temporary <PowerIconKeywords:STR> equal to 25% of your permanent STR.

CN: 获得 [Arg1] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，额外获得等同于永久力量 25%([Arg3]) 的临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。
EN: Gain [Arg1] <PowerIconKeywords:STR>, then gain [Arg3] Temporary <PowerIconKeywords:STR> (25% of permanent STR).

CN: 所有唤醒体获得 <Energy:15> 点狂气，下回合开始时，获得 5% 最大生命 <SacrificeKeyWord:献祭>。
EN: Increase all Awakeners' Aliemus by <Energy:15>. Suffer a Delayed <SacrificeKeyWord:Sacrifice> equal to 5% of your Max HP.

CN: 所有唤醒体获得 <Energy:15> 点狂气，下回合开始时，受到最大生命 5%([Arg3]) 的<SacrificeKeyWord:献祭>。
EN: Increase all Awakeners' Aliemus by <Energy:15>. Suffer [Arg3] Delayed <SacrificeKeyWord:Sacrifice> (5% of Max HP).

CN: 获得 [Arg1]% 临时暴击率和 [Arg2] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。 若在首领战中且本回合尚未打出过任何牌，则尝试触发 [Arg3] 次死亡抵抗，若成功则获得 <Block:[Block:Arg4]> 点护盾，此效果只能触发 [Arg5] 次。
EN: Gain +[Arg1]% Temp. Crit. Rate and [Arg2] <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. If you're in a Final Battle and have played no cards this turn, attempt to trigger <DeathResistanceIconKeywords:Death Resistance> [Arg3] time(s). If successful, gain <Block:[Block:Arg4]> Shield. This effect can only trigger [Arg5] time(s) per battle.

CN: 从抽牌堆中抽 [Arg1] 张算力消耗最低的卡牌。若当前界域为「深海」，则额外使<TentacleInjurieIconKeywords:触腕伤害>提高 [Arg2] 点。
EN: Draw [Arg1] cards with the lowest Arithmetica Cost from the Draw Pile. If the Realm includes Aequor, increase <TentacleInjurieIconKeywords:Tentacle DMG> by [Arg2].

CN: 选择 1 名唤醒体使其获得 <Energy:[Arg2]>  点狂气，获得 [Arg3] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，若当前界域为「血肉」，额外使<EmbryoFusionIconKeywords:胚胎融合> + [Arg4]，但失去 10%当前生命。
EN: Increase a chosen Awakener's Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg2]>. Gain [Arg3] <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. If the Realm includes Caro, consume 10% of your HP to increase <EmbryoFusionIconKeywords:Embryo Fusion> by +[Arg4]%.

CN: 选择 1 名唤醒体使其获得 <Energy:[Arg2]>  点狂气，获得 [Arg3] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，若当前界域为「血肉」，额外使<EmbryoFusionIconKeywords:胚胎融合> + [Arg4]，但失去 10%([Arg1])当前生命。
EN: Increase a chosen Awakener's Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg2]>. Gain [Arg3] <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. If the Realm includes Caro, consume <Damage:[Arg1]> (10% of current) HP to increase <EmbryoFusionIconKeywords:Embryo Fusion> by +[Arg4]%.

CN: 获得 [Arg4] 点算力。选择 1 名唤醒体，将其 [Arg1] 张「打击」与 [Arg1] 张「防御」的原始复制置入手中，并使他们获得<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>，<NothingnessIconKeywords:虚无>。若当前界域为「超维」，则额外获得 [Arg2] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>与 [Arg3] 点临时<AlertIconKeywords:戒备>。
EN: Recover [Arg4] Arithmetica. Choose an Awakener; create [Arg1] of their basic Strike and [Arg1] of their basic Defense Commands. They have <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust> and <NothingnessIconKeywords:Fleeting>. If the Realm includes Ultra, gain [Arg2] Temp. <PowerIconKeywords:STR> and [Arg3] Temp. <AlertIconKeywords:Alert>.

CN: 获得 [Arg1] 点<RetaliateIconKeywords:反击>，使所有敌人降低 [Arg2] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。若当前处于「超维回合」，不再降低临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，则对所有敌人造成等同于自身<RetaliateIconKeywords:反击>的伤害。
EN: Gain [Arg1] <RetaliateIconKeywords:Counter> and inflict [Arg2] Temp. <ExhaustionIconKeywords:STR▼> on all enemies. If in an Ultra Round, deal DMG equal to your <RetaliateIconKeywords:Counter> to all enemies instead of inflicting <ExhaustionIconKeywords:STR▼>.

CN: 获得 [Arg1] 点算力，下回合开始时获得 <Block:[Block:Arg2]> 点护盾。若当前界域为「深海」且处于「潮涌」姿态，则效果变为生成 [Arg3] 条触腕。
EN: Recover [Arg1] Arithmetica and gain <Block:[Block:Arg2]> Delayed Shield. If your Tentacle Stance is "Surging Tides", instead summon [Arg3] Tentacles.

CN: 对生命最高敌人造成 [Arg2] 点<IntoxicationIconKeywords:中毒>，获得 <Block:[Block:Arg1]> 点护盾。若本回合触发过「吞噬」，不再获得护盾，触发该敌人一半的<IntoxicationIconKeywords:中毒>。
EN: Inflict [Arg2] <IntoxicationIconKeywords:Poison> on the highest HP enemy, and gain <Block:[Block:Arg1]> Shield. If "Devour" has been triggered this turn, trigger half of that enemy's <IntoxicationIconKeywords:Poison> instead of gaining Shield.

CN: 从抽牌堆中选择 [Arg1] 张牌加入手中，并使其算力消耗降低 [Arg2]。
EN: Search your Draw Pile for [Arg1] card(s) to put into your hand, and reduce their Arithmetica Cost by [Arg2].

CN: 获得 [Arg1] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，将 [Arg2] 张<DerivativeCardKeywords_4:「灵感」>置入手中。若当前为超维回合，效果变更为将 [Arg3] 张<DerivativeCardKeywords_4:「灵感」>置入手中。
EN: Gain [Arg1] <PowerIconKeywords:STR> and create [Arg2] <DerivativeCardKeywords_4:"Insight">. If in an Ultra Round, instead create [Arg3] <DerivativeCardKeywords_4:"Insight">.

CN: 选择 1 个已解锁的钥令释放并使其生效 2 次，每个已解锁的钥令在本次探索中只能选择 1 次，不可选择初始携带的钥令。
EN: Unleash 1 of 3 unequipped Posses twice. Each Posse can only be unleashed this way once per investigation.

CN: 从随机 3 个钥令中选择 1 个钥令释放，每个已解锁的钥令在本次探索中只能选择 1 次，不可选择初始携带的钥令。
EN: Unleash 1 of 3 unequipped Posses. Each Posse can only be unleashed this way once per investigation.

CN: 抽 1 张牌，如果抽到指令卡或灵知觉醒，将其算力消耗变为 0，并使其拥有者获得 <Energy:[Arg1]> 点狂气。否则将这张牌弃掉并重复此条效果。
EN: Draw a card; if the drawn card is a Command or Rouse card, reduce its Arithmetica Cost to 0 and increase its owner's Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg1]>. Otherwise, discard that card and repeat this process.

CN: 获得 [Arg1] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，抽 2 张牌。若当前界域为「血肉」，损失 10% 当前生命，额外获得 [Arg2] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，手中每有 1 张<DerivativeCardKeywords_2:「胚胎」>额外获得 [Arg2] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。
EN: Draw 2 cards and gain [Arg1] Temp. <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. If the Realm includes Caro, consume 10% of your HP to gain another [Arg2] Temp. <PowerIconKeywords:STR>, and another [Arg2] Temp. <PowerIconKeywords:STR> for each <DerivativeCardKeywords_2:"Embryo"> in your hand.

CN: 获得 [Arg1] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，抽 2 张牌。若当前界域为「血肉」，损失 10% 当前生命([Arg3])，额外获得 [Arg2] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，手中每有 1 张<DerivativeCardKeywords_2:「胚胎」>额外获得 [Arg2] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。
EN: Draw 2 cards and gain [Arg1] Temp. <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. If the Realm includes Caro, consume <Damage:[Arg3]> (10% of current) HP to gain another [Arg2] Temp. <PowerIconKeywords:STR>, and another [Arg2] Temp. <PowerIconKeywords:STR> for each <DerivativeCardKeywords_2:"Embryo"> in your hand.

CN: 获得 [Arg1] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。受到攻击伤害时，下回合开始时获得 [Arg2]% 伤害的护盾。若当前界域为「血肉」，不再获得延迟护盾，而是积攒 10% 伤害的回复量到猩红熔炉。
EN: Gain [Arg1] <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. Until your next turn, whenever you take Active DMG, gain Delayed Shield equal to <Block:[Arg2]%> of that DMG. If the Realm includes Caro, instead accumulate Crimson Furnace equal to 10% of that DMG.

CN: 获得 1 点算力和 [Arg1] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，选择一名唤醒体获得 [Arg2] 点狂气。若当前界域为「深海」且处于「怒涛」姿态，效果改为获得 15% 临时暴击率和临时暴击伤害。
EN: Recover 1 Arithmetica and gain [Arg1] <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. Increase a chosen Awakener's Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg2]>. If your Tentacle Stance is Raging Waves, instead gain +15% Temporary Crit. Rate & Crit. DMG.

CN: 界域精通提高 [Arg1]。选择 1 名唤醒体使其获得 <Energy:[Energy:Arg2]> 点狂气。
EN: Increase <ProficientInRealmsIconKeywords:Realm Mastery> by [Arg1]. Increase a chosen Awakener's Aliemus by <Energy:[Energy:Arg2]>.

CN: 选择 1 张手中的非衍生指令卡，获得一张附加<DepleteIconKeywords:消耗>的原始复制，并使指令卡的所有者获得 <Energy:[Arg1]> 点狂气。
EN: Choose a Non-Derived Command card in hand and create a basic Copy of it. The copy has <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>. Increase its owner's Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg1]>.

CN: 抽 2 张牌，获得 2 点算力，所有唤醒体失去 5 点狂气。若当前处于「静海」姿态，对所有敌人施加 [Arg1] 层<IntoxicationIconKeywords:中毒>，在首领战中发挥 3 倍效果。
EN: Draw 2 cards. Recover 2 Arithmetica. All Awakeners lose <Energy:5> Aliemus. If your Tentacle Stance is "Tranquil Sea", inflict [Arg1] <IntoxicationIconKeywords:Poison> on all enemies. Inflict 3× that much <IntoxicationIconKeywords:Poison> instead in Final Battles.

CN: 从四种<D06CardKeeperSkill:诗页>中选择一项，并将其从选项中移除。所有诗页都被选择后，重置。
EN: Choose one of four <D06CardKeeperSkill:Poetry Pages> that haven't been chosen; reset after all <D06CardKeeperSkill:Poems> have been chosen.

CN: 获得 [Arg1] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。
EN: Gain [Arg1] <PowerIconKeywords:STR>.

CN: 所有唤醒体获得 10 点狂气。
EN: Increase all Awakeners' Aliemus by <Energy:10>.

CN: 临时暴击率 +30%。
EN: Gain +30% Temporary Crit. Rate.

CN: 将 1 枚<C05_yansheng2:闪耀偏方骰子>置入手中，获得 [Arg1]% 临时暴击率。
EN: Create 1 <C05_yansheng2:Shining Octahedron Dice> and gain [Arg1]% Temporary Crit. Rate.

CN: 本回合下一张打出的卡牌若算力消耗大于等于 3，获得 2 点算力，否则抽 2 张牌。若为本场战斗中第 4 次生效，改为直接获得 4 张「灵感」。
EN: If the Arithmetica Cost of the next card you play this turn is 3 or more, recover 2 Arithmetica. Otherwise, draw 2 cards. If this is the 4th time this Posse was unleashed this battle, instead create 4 <DerivativeCardKeywords_4:"Insight">.

CN: 本回合下一张打出的卡牌若算力消耗大于等于 3，获得 2 点算力，否则抽 2 张牌。若为本场战斗中第 4 次生效，改为直接获得 4 张「灵感」。([Arg1]/4)
EN: If the Arithmetica Cost of the next card you play this turn is 3 or more, recover 2 Arithmetica. Otherwise, draw 2 cards. If this is the 4th time this Posse was unleashed this battle, instead create 4 <DerivativeCardKeywords_4:"Insight">. ([Arg1]/4)

CN: 选择一名唤醒体，抽 2 张该唤醒体的指令卡。
EN: Choose an Awakener; draw 2 of their Command cards.

CN: <FaxianKeywords:发现> 3 个随机的钥令，选择其中 1 个触发其效果并获得 <Posse:[Arg1]> 点银钥能量。
EN: <FaxianKeywords:Discover> 3 random Posses; unleash 1 and gain <Posse:[Arg1]> Keyflare.

CN: 选择一名唤醒体获得 [Arg1] 点狂气，对所有敌人施加 [Arg2] 层<IntoxicationIconKeywords:中毒>，目标每损失 1％ 生命额外触发 1％ 中毒，至多触发 50％中毒。
EN: Increase a chosen Awakener's Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg1]>, and inflict [Arg2] <IntoxicationIconKeywords:Poison> on all enemies. For each 1% of HP the target is missing, trigger 1% of their <IntoxicationIconKeywords:Poison>, up to 50%.

CN: 回复 [Arg1] 点生命，获得 [Arg2] 点力量。若克莱门汀在队伍中，使她本回合下次打出的指令卡伤害、护盾、生命回复、获得狂气、获得银钥能量的效果次数提高 1。
EN: Recover <Heal:[Arg1]> HP and gain [Arg2] <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. If Clementine is in your team, add 1 extra instance of the following effects to her next Command card you play: DMG, Shield, HP Recovery, Aliemus, and Keyflare.

CN: 获得 [Arg1] 点护盾，抽 [Arg2] 张牌。若克珀珊特在队伍中，还会将 1 张「领航」置入手中。
EN: Draw [Arg2] card(s). Gain <Block:[Arg1]> Shield. If Corposant is in your team, create 1 "Pilot".

CN: 选择一名唤醒体使其获得 <Energy:[Energy:Arg3]> 点狂气，从抽牌堆中抽 [Arg2] 张算力消耗最低的卡牌。若卡斯托尔在队伍中，使其伤害强效临时提高 [Arg1]％。
EN: Increase a chosen Awakener's Aliemus by <Energy:[Energy:Arg3]>. Draw [Arg2] card(s) with the lowest Arithmetica Cost from the Draw Pile. If Castor is in your team, increase his Temp. DMG Amplification by [Arg1]%.

CN: <TouquKeywords:偷取>所有敌人 [Arg1] 点 <PowerIconKeywords:力量>。若杜勒赛因在队伍中，获得 1 个「残骸」。
EN: <TouquKeywords:Steal> [Arg1] <PowerIconKeywords:STR> from all enemies. If Doresain is in your team, he gains 1 "Corpse".

CN: 从出战唤醒体的技能卡中<FaxianKeywords:发现> 3 张，选择 1 张将其临时复制置入手中，并使其算力消耗降低 1。若当前界域为「血肉」，可以选择「一扫而光！」。
EN: <FaxianKeywords:Discover> 1 of 3 basic Skill Commands from the Awakeners in your team; it has <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>, and its Arithmetica Cost is reduced by 1. If the Realm includes Caro, you may choose "Gobble Up!"

CN: 将全部卡牌置入手中，但不再降低算力消耗。
EN: Instead create all 3 Discovered Skill cards, but their Arithmetica Costs are not reduced.

CN: 获得 <Block:[Block:Arg1]> 点护盾，获得 1 层「星辰庇佑」，最大积攒 5 层，战斗结束后不清除。
EN: Gain <Block:[Block:Arg1]> Shield and 1 stack of "Stellar Protection". Max 5 stacks. Stacks persist between battles.

CN: 所有唤醒体获得 [Arg1] 点狂气。消耗所有「星辰庇佑」并获得与消耗层数相同的算力，若当前界域为「深海」，额外生成与消耗层数相同的临时触腕。
EN: Increase all Awakeners' Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg1]>. Consume all "Stellar Protection". For each stack consumed, recover 1 Arithmetica; if the Realm includes Aequor, also summon that many Temporary Tentacles.

CN: 选择一名唤醒体，使其指令卡暴击率和暴击伤害临时提高 [Arg1]% 并获得 [Arg2] 点狂气。若莉兹在队伍中，还会将 1 张附加「消耗」的「腐化绿炎」置入手中。
EN: Increase a chosen Awakener's Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg2]>, and the Temp. Crit. Rate & Crit. DMG of their Command cards by [Arg1]%. If Liz is in your team, create 1 "Corrupted Flames" with <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>.

CN: 对所有敌人造成 1 回合<WeaknessIconKeywords:虚弱>和<VulnerabilityIconKeywords:易伤>，临时降低所有敌人 [Arg1] 点<ExhaustionIconKeywords:力量>，每有 1 名敌人获得 [Arg1] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。
EN: Inflict 1 turn of <WeaknessIconKeywords:Weakness> and <VulnerabilityIconKeywords:Vulnerable> on each enemy. For each enemy, inflict [Arg1] Temp. <ExhaustionIconKeywords:STR▼> on them and gain [Arg1] Temp. <PowerIconKeywords:STR>.

CN: 临时降低所有敌人 [Arg1] 点<PowerIconKeywords:力量>，每有 1 名敌人获得 [Arg1] 点临时<PowerIconKeywords:力量>。若杜勒赛因在队伍中，获得 1 个「残骸」。
EN: For each enemy, inflict [Arg1] <ExhaustionIconKeywords:STR▼> on them and gain [Arg1] <PowerIconKeywords:STR>. If Doresain is in your team, he gains 1 "Corpse".

CN: 获得 1 点算力和 [Arg1]％ 临时强效。若凯蒂古拉在队伍中，抽 1 张其「指令卡」并赋予 1 层「<HuoyanKeywords:活焰>」
EN: Recover 1 Arithmetica and gain [Arg1]% Temp. DMG Amplification. If Kathigu-Ra is in your team, draw 1 of her cards and apply 1 stack of <HuoyanKeywords:"Fiamma"> to it.

CN: 选择 1 名唤醒体，将 1 张算力消耗为 0 的临时「打击」置入手中。每第 3 次释放，改为将 1 张「美丽瞬间」置入手中，并使所有唤醒体临时暴击率提高 [Arg1]％。
EN: Choose an Awakener; create 1 of their basic Strike Commands. It has <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>. Every 3rd time this is unleashed, instead create 1 <DerivativeCardKeywords_40:"Fleeting Beauty"> and gain +[Arg1]% Temp. Crit. Rate.

CN: 选择 1 名唤醒体，将 1 张算力消耗为 0 的临时「打击」置入手中。每第 3 次释放，改为将 1 张「美丽瞬间」置入手中，并使所有唤醒体临时暴击率提高 [Arg1]％(当前已释放 [Arg2] 次)。
EN: Choose an Awakener; create 1 of their basic Strike Commands. It has <DepleteIconKeywords:Exhaust>. Every 3rd time this is unleashed, instead create 1 <DerivativeCardKeywords_40:"Fleeting Beauty"> and gain +[Arg1]% Temp. Crit. Rate. ([Arg2]/3)

CN: 选择一名唤醒体获得 [Arg1] 点狂气，将 1 张 <DerivativeCardKeywords_4:「灵感」>洗入抽牌堆。若皮克曼在队伍中，使其获得 1 层「<Chuangyi:创意>」。
EN: Increase a chosen Awakener's Aliemus by <Energy:[Arg1]>, and shuffle 1 <DerivativeCardKeywords_4:"Insight"> into the Draw Pile. If Pickman is in your team, he gains 1 stack of "<Chuangyi:Creativity>".
